citeinfo.origin: People's Republic of China, State Oceanic Administration (SOA)
citeinfo.title: Coastal Station Data from Station Dong Shan, China in China Real Time Data Base (RTDB) for NEAR-GOOS

abstract.p: Coastal station data, collected from Station Dong Shan, are provided by NMEFC (National Research Center for Marine Environmental Forecasts) of China and NMDIS (National Marine Data and Information Services) of China. There are three types of data: 1) coastal station temperature and salinity data; 2) coastal station wave and wind data; and 3) station data.
Data can be downloaded from the China Real Time Data Base for NEAR-GOOS. First time users must register to gain database access.

descript.purpose: The National Marine Data and Information Service of China (NMDIS) has developed and maintained China Delayed Mode Data Base for NEAR-GOOS (CDMDB) to offer basic data service to NEAR-GOOS and GOOS communities.

idinfo.accconst: First time users must register to gain database access.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.
